snippet: Senator Marco Rubio disputed a Heritage Foundation analysis released Monday that found the legislation offering a pathway to citizenship would produce a “lifetime fiscal deficit” of at least $6.3 trillion.
abstract: Sen Marco Rubio disputes Heritage Foundation report estimating that new immigration legislation will cost taxpayers $6.3 trillion.
lead_paragraph: Senator Marco Rubio disputed a Heritage Foundation analysis released Monday that found the legislation offering a pathway to citizenship would produce a “lifetime fiscal deficit” of at least $6.3 trillion.

headline.seo: Rubio Says Heritage Foundation Analysis on Immigration Is Flawed
headline.main: Rubio Disputes Report on Immigration Bill Costs
headline.print_headline: Rubio Disputes Report On Immigration Bill Costs
